name: ion-deluge
effect: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
short_effect: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.

flavor_text.x-y: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
